River Runner

A lightweight tool for reporting river conditions in the field.

Usage Guide Observation Types Design Notes Launch Survey

Welcome

River Runner is a community-powered data collection tool for monitoring river health. This version uses Survey123 to allow rapid reporting of issues like:

  • Erosion
  • Invasive Species
  • Dumping and Debris
  • Unusual Water Conditions

Observations are submitted through a mobile-friendly survey and stored in an ArcGIS Feature Layer. You can start collecting right now using a phone or browser.

Project Goals

  • Enable fast and accessible field reporting
  • Support data-driven outreach and advocacy
  • Serve as a prototype for a future standalone Flutter app
